Home

Hi, welcome! I am a third year PhD candidate at the University of Edinburgh, supervised by Nadin Kökciyan. My PhD focus on computational methods to make implicit information explicit when people argue. More broadly, I am interested in theories and models of collective reasoning in humans and finding ways that technology can be used to mediate disagreement. I created this blog to work on communicating my ideas and work, feel free to explore and don't be afraid to get in touch!
